product_overview: FloorPro is made for garages and industrial spaces that demand toughness, cleanability, and impact resistance.
key_features: üåç Multi-Surface Application: Works across Smooth concrete

recommended_use.intro: Perfect for interior and exterior applications, including:
items: Designed for warehouses, basements, and garages

application_system.label: Topcoat
application_system.purpose: Builds final protective layer for durability.

thinner: Thinner: Clean potable water (max 10% dilution if required)
surface_preparation: Etch surface and clean dust before application
For masonry/concrete, cure fully and remove efflorescence before application.
application: Apply with brush, roller or spray. Ensure base is clean and cured.
storage_safety: Use PPE (gloves, mask, goggles) during application.
Keep out of reach of children.
Avoid inhalation of mist; ventilate during use.
In case of eye contact, rinse immediately with clean water.
